name: Security Scan Hook
description: Triggers security validation for on-chain transactions and smart contracts

then.prompt: Activate Security Validator Agent with the following context: Use #security-validator-steering for comprehensive security analysis. Follow deep-research-agent-steering core rules. Analyze contracts, tokens, and transactions for security risks. Provide risk ratings, slippage estimates, and security recommendations. Never execute transactions - only provide human-reviewable security assessments and approval cards.
